name: siebelscriptandwebtempeditor
displayName: Siebel Script And Web Template Editor
description: Enables the editing of Siebel object server scripts and web templates in VSCode and updating them in Siebel using the Siebel REST API

activitybar.title: Siebel Script And Web Template Editor

configuration.title: Siebel Script And Web Template Editor

siebelScriptAndWebTempEditor.REST Endpoi.description:
Parameteres for connection to the Siebel REST API, use the following format: CUSTOMNAME/USERNAME/PASSWORD@SIEBELRESTENDPOINT, e.g. DEVENV/USERNAME/PASSWORD@https://devclient.devdomain.com/siebel/v1.0.
 Press the Reload button on the extension after editing configurations!

siebelScriptAndWebTempEditor.workspaces.description:
Workspaces to use for the different connections, multiple can be given for each connection, use a colon after the connection, then the workspace names separated by commas, one is mandatory, CUSTOMNAME:WORKSPACENAME1,WORKSPACENAME2, e.g. DEVENV:custom_dev_ws,other_dev_ws.
 Press the Reload button on the extension after editing configurations!

siebelScriptAndWebTempEditor.defaultConn.description: Use the 'Set as default' button in the extension to change it. Name of the default REST connection and workspace to use, e.g. DEVENV:custom_dev_ws
